author: Trevor Smith
title: J.I.D - LAUDER (Prod. By J. Cole)
text:
0 MAKE IT STOP Listen to a J. Cole-produced track from J.I.D's "The Never Story" album. 
J.I.D is J. Cole 's latest signee to Dreamville Records and on Friday he released his first project for the label The Never Story . Cole contributes production to closing track "LAUDER," which is one of the project's very best tracks. The Atlanta rapper sounds like a young Kendrick at his most exasperated on the record, as technical as he is animated.In a recent interview with HNHH , J.I.D spoke of the natural way in which his signing with Dreamville came together. "It was really organic. It wasn't no industry shit, it was really like 'I fuck with your art'-type shit," he said. "It happened so naturally, it didn't even feel like they had to ask me [to sign]."Watch the full interview below. Stream The Never Story here . Quotable Lyrics: So part of the reason I be so hard on my peopleWe never had it easy, never had a pot to pee inI be on my knees praying to my onomatopoeiasPacking a coliseum, ain't no parkingI gotta see J.I.DGotta be there for my familyI gotta, can't try to beI could out of my mind, thinking logicallyNo apologies for speaking how I feelI silently swore solemnly
